Module: util/rnd

util/rnd

Methods

fastRand(min, max, setsize)

Generates a function that returns a faster random integer generator, but which has a setup cost. If you're generating a very large number of random numbers, this is significantly faster.

See jsperf.com

e.g. 

// This bit is slow
var nextRand = rnd.fastRand(1, 10);
// This bit is fast
var n = nextRand();
Parameters:
Name Type Description
min Number Lowest possible value
max Number Highest possible value
setsize Number Optional. The number of values to precalculate.

fastRandFloat(min, max, setsize)

Generates a function that returns a faster random float generator, but which has a setup cost. If you're generating a very large number of random numbers, this is significantly faster.

See jsperf.com

e.g. 

// This bit is slow
var nextRand = rnd.fastRandFloat(0, 1);
// This bit is fast
var n = nextRand();
Parameters:
Name Type Description
min Number Lowest possible value
max Number Highest possible value
setsize Number Optional. The number of values to precalculate.

rnd(min, max)

Return a random integer.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
min Lowest possible value
max Highest possible value

rndFloat(min, max)

Return a random float.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
min Lowest possible value
max Highest possible value
